title: New Client Huge Problem
body:
Everytime I use the new client, every now and then I load in game and my screen begins to flicker massively and won't stop. Now, your first thought is that it's a driver or video card issue, but it's not. Everything is up-to-date and only happens when I use the new client. Old client works perfectly.

"Why don't you use the old client?" Well duh, it's being retired. How can I fix this? Mind you all is up-to-date.

replies.body: Hmmmmm you're right to think that this might be caused by some kind of driver issue, so that's a little strange that updating those didn't seem to help at all. I definitely don't want to send you here or there in hopes that something would fix that, so let's go ahead and get you in touch with our tech guys through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to see a lot more than I can, and should be able to help with that flickering!
